Uses of Class
gui.WireImage

Packages that use WireImage
controller Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data. 
gui Contains the application's graphical user interface. 
model Contains the circuit model and implements logic for running the simulation.

Methods in controller with parameters of type WireImage

          Inserts a wire node into a segment of an existing wire's path.

Methods in gui that return WireImage

          Returns the wire currently being created.
 WireImage WireNode.getOwner()
          Returns the WireImage object that owns this node.

Constructors in gui with parameters of type WireImage

Uses of WireImage in model

Methods in model with parameters of type WireImage
